title: S-Touch
short_description: A mobile application designed exclusively for Subharti University students to streamline campus life.
long_description: S-Touch is a mobile application designed exclusively for Subharti University students. It streamlines campus life by providing easy access to notices, events, grievance submission, and leave management. Built with a focus on user-centric design, the app ensures students can interact with university services effortlessly and stay updated in real-time. My role involved mapping user journeys, creating wireframes, and developing high-fidelity prototypes to improve overall usability.

title: Subhartian
short_description: A campus community platform connecting students, alumni, and faculty in a vibrant digital ecosystem.
long_description: Subhartian connects Subharti University students, alumni, and faculty in a vibrant digital ecosystem. The platform encourages collaboration, networking, and knowledge sharing while offering personalized content, verified connections, and event notifications. The design emphasizes accessibility and intuitive navigation for a seamless campus experience across web and mobile.

title: 121Vibes
short_description: A lifestyle and productivity app to help users track goals, manage tasks, and boost well-being.
long_description: 121Vibes is a lifestyle and productivity app developed by OIO Softwares. It helps users track personal goals, manage tasks, and engage with interactive features designed to boost daily efficiency and well-being. The app combines minimalistic design with powerful functionality, ensuring a smooth and engaging user experience. I contributed to the UI refinement and prototyping phases.

title: Mentora
short_description: A student-alumni networking app designed to foster mentorship and career growth.
long_description: Mentora is a mobile app designed to bridge students and alumni of Subharti University, fostering mentorship, knowledge sharing, and career growth. The platform offers blogs, verified connections, job and internship opportunities, events, and a dedicated Connect section. Built with a user-centered design approach as part of the UpGrad + KnowledgeHut Bootcamp, Mentora ensures intuitive navigation, engaging interactions, and meaningful user journeys.
